snippet: KEIDEN--Sheldon. Dear Sandy, Shelley's death has been devastating to all of us. The Podells will always be there for you and your family. Love, Bunny Podell Weinrib 1/3
lead_paragraph: KEIDEN--Sheldon. Dear Sandy, Shelley's death has been devastating to all of us. The Podells will always be there for you and your family. Love, Bunny Podell Weinrib 1/3
